Far North open for business during State Highway 1 Brynderwyns closure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-open-for-business-during-sh1-brynderwyns-closure/4I6K4CBAVBDJVC5B2SVA3FMC4M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-open-for-business-during-sh1-brynderwyns-closure/4I6K4CBAVBDJVC5B2SVA3FMC4M/ Mike DinsdaleHope publicity campaign will bring people to the Far North during SH1 closure. Christchurch Port Hills fire ‘contained but not out’, operations to continue until Thursday https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-port-hills-fire-contained-but-not-out-operations-to-continue-until-thursday/P7JUTV7JMZGDVJO6F7D4CP7RVU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-port-hills-fire-contained-but-not-out-operations-to-continue-until-thursday/P7JUTV7JMZGDVJO6F7D4CP7RVU/ Pierre NixonFire crews say they're focusing on extinguishing 40 hotspots. Photo / Chris Skelton
